body.p: To His Excellency Thomas E Bramlett Govenor of Kentucky Your petitioners would respectfully represent that at the april Term of the Boyd Circuit Court fines wer assessed against Doc William Pugh for the following amounts for selling to a soldier fifty dollars in two case's for retailing Twenty dollars then sales wer all made to officers in the United States Army and whilst the town of Catlettsburg in which Doc Pugh Keeps his Drug Store was govreened by Soldiers and the Citizens absolutely afraid to refuse any request made by the soldiers, Doc Pugh is a Gentleman a law abiding quiet Loyal citizen and we earnestly pray a remission of his fines

M W Noris
Frank Mott
M Williams
Ben Burk
John M Burns
James Seaton
S. L. Zeigler
Kelsey N Harris
J D Jones
L. T. Moore
